S04n403:1: atha avalokiteśvaro bhagavantametadavocat–adṛṣṭamaṇḍalasya na dātavyāṃ kathaṃ bhagavatpadmāṅkamudrāmanugṛhṇāti ?
S04n403:5: maṇḍalasyedaṃ nimittaṃ caturasraṃ pañcahastapramāṇaṃ sāmantakena madhye maṇḍalasyāmitābhaṃ likhet |
S04n403:6: indranīlacūrṇaṃ padmarāgacūrṇaṃ marakatacūrṇaṃ sphāṭikacūrṇaṃ suvarṇarūpyacūrṇānyamitābhasya tathāgatasya kāye saṃyojayitavyāni |
S04n403:8: vāmapārśve ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā kartavyā caturbhujā śaratkāṇḍagauravarṇā,
S04n403:12: dau hastau saṃprayuktau sarvarājendrā nāma mudrā kartavyā |
S04n403:16: tasya ca maṇḍalasya caturdvāreṣu catvāro mahārājāḥ kartavyāḥ,
S04n403:19: yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā icchati maṇḍalaṃ praveṣṭum,
S04n403:30: athāmitābhastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho'valokiteśvarametadavocat–yadi kulaputra indranīlacūrṇaṃ padmarāgacūrṇaṃ suvarṇarūpyacūrṇaṃ daridrasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā na saṃvidyante tāni cūrṇāni,
S04n403:33: yadi kulaputra tadapi na saṃvidyate deśāntaragatasya sthānapadacyutasya,
